data.title: Woody Allen's "Irrational Man," Starring Emma Stone and Parker Posey, Opens Today
data.meta_description: Director/writer Woody Allen's latest film, "Irrational Man," starring Emma Stone and Joaquin Phoenix, debuts July 17.
data.text:
It tells the story of a middle-aged philosophy professor in a life crisis, whose muse is renewed when he starts a relationship with a beautiful young student, according to a report on Slashfilm.com. The film also features actress Parker Posey.

Here is the trailer:

*

Allen is also in pre-production for a yet-untitled forthcoming 2016 film that will star Jesse Eisenberg, Bruce Willis and Kristen Stewart.

No plot details were available for the project (as is customary for Allen), who returned to Hollywood after his Broadway musical Bullets Over Broadway experienced only a brief run in 2014.
